articles.title: Da 5 Bloods review – Spike Lee goes all out in Vietnam - The Guardian
articles.description: Four Vietnam vets reunite in a search for their fallen comrade – and some gold bullion – in Lee’s inventive, action-packed but disjointed all-star adventure
articles.content: Last year, Spike Lee won his first competitive Academy Award as co-writer of BlacKkKlansman, a stranger-than-fiction tale of an African-American cop infiltrating the Ku Klux Klan in the early 70s. Th… [+4743 chars]
